TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Bond extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.
Docs.remarks:
Enumerates value returned by the following:
.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.Bond Bonded = int32(12)

format.i: Being bonded (paired) with a remote device does not necessarily mean the device is currently connected. It just means that the pending procedure was completed at some earlier time, and the link key is still stored locally, ready to use on the next connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.Bond Bonding = int32(11)

summary.para: Indicates bonding (pairing) is in progress with the remote device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.Bond None = int32(10)

summary.para: There is no shared link key with the remote device, so communication (if it is allowed at all) will be unauthenticated and unencrypted.
